file_content.text: I'll monitor your progress, Commander. Watch your step in there. Doctor Semhess runs a tight ship. Her eyes never leave her work for long.
Unauthorized visitors detected. Engaging laboratory security protocols.
Welcome to the X7-Cratus. Your timing is perfect. Our troops are just about to start real-world testing.
RS-33 turns ordinary soldiers into devastating killing machines. And it turns elite warriors like Marlon Fenn here into, well, you'll see for yourself.
Containment systems damaged. Traces of RAK-5 detected in social quarters. Initiating Vital Personnel Quarantine Safeguards. Please proceed to designated safe zones immediately.
Careless, clumsy fools! You've put this entire facility at risk. There will be consequences!
Careful, Commander. I'm picking up traces of an unknown airborne chemical in the base. Looks like it could cause extreme mutagenic biological reactions.
Our work is too important to let you interfere! Icarr, Nyris, eradicate this contaminant!
Critical overload of Vital Personnel Quarantine Safeguards detected. Airborne RAK-5 levels rising. Initiating purge protocols.
Do you have any idea what you've done? The RAK-5 serum isn't stable! We've all been exposed!
You did this! You turned us into these... monsters!
Thrash and gnash! Tear them to pieces!
Purge protocols complete. Airborne RAK-5 levels now stable.
